name: AL's Big Adventure
description:
In this single player platform game, you need to navigate our hero AL through the toxic work environment, collecting the required coins and wrenches, to open the door to enter the next level. Avoid landing in the toxic soups, and jump over gas clouds and spinning impellers. Jump and land on dangerous co-workers, mutated giant spiders, and living poop. It's all just a normal work day for AL. There are 10 levels to play. Single player only. 

NOTE: This game is only made for a PC desktop or laptop. NO additional in game purchases or annoying advertisements.
